parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of bodies in the folder

title: IBodyFolder.IGetBodies
description: Gets the bodies in the folder.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of bodies in the folder

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of IBody2 objects VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This method gets the bodies in the folder; it does not get the bodies in any subfolders. See
Accessing Bodies in Body Folders
for details about the BodyFolder interface.
To get the number of bodies in the folder, use
IBodyFolder::GetBodyCount
before using this method.
